channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-34603|2024-07-08T06:12:40.540Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper access control in Samsung Message prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to access location data.

item.title: CVE-2024-34602|2024-07-08T06:12:39.337Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in Samsung Messages prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-20861|2024-07-03T20:51:24.659Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Use after free vulnerability in SveService prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to cause memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2024-20866|2024-07-03T20:26:04.544Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Setupwizard prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to skip activation step.

item.title: CVE-2024-34592|2024-07-03T20:45:26.235Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation in parsing RTCP SDES packet in librtp.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to trigger temporary denial of service. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-20881|2024-07-03T20:49:18.412Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in chnactiv TA prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers lead to potential arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-20847|2024-07-03T20:52:27.882Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in StorageManagerService prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to read sdcard information.

item.title: CVE-2024-20891|2024-07-03T20:48:33.533Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper access control in launchFullscreenIntent of SystemUI prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to launch privileged activities.

item.title: CVE-2024-34593|2024-07-03T20:44:14.312Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation in parsing and distributing RTCP packet in librtp.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with system privilege. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-20878|2024-07-03T20:49:37.360Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Heap out-of-bound write vulnerability in parsing grid image in libsavscmn.so prior to SMR June-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20877|2024-07-03T20:49:54.375Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Heap out-of-bound write vulnerability in parsing grid image header in libsavscmn.so prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20876|2024-07-03T20:50:14.121Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper input validation in libsheifdecadapter.so prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2024-20889|2024-07-03T20:46:38.977Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper authentication in BLE prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows adjacent attackers to pair with devices.

item.description: Improper input validation in libmediaextractorservice.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to trigger memory corruption.

item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in RCS function in IMS service prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information.

item.description: Improper access control in KnoxCustomManagerService prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to configure Knox privacy policy.

item.description: Improper access control in Dar service prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to bypass restriction for calling SDP features.

item.title: CVE-2024-20892|2024-07-02T18:14:27.091Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper verification of signature in FilterProvider prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute privileged behaviors. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-20896|2024-07-02T18:08:41.169Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in Configuration message prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information.

item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in FCM function in IMS service prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information.

item.description: Improper handling of exceptional conditions in Secure Folder prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to bypass authentication under certain condition. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.description: Improper access control in launchApp of SystemUI prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to launch privileged activities.

item.description: Improper authentication in MTP application prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to enter MTP mode without proper authentication.

item.description: Improper input validation in parsing RTCP SDES packet in librtp.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to trigger temporary denial of service. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.description: Improper access control in launchFullscreenIntent of SystemUI prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to launch privileged activities.

item.description: Improper input validation in Tips prior to version 6.2.9.4 in Android 14 allows local attacker to send broadcast with Tips' privilege.

item.description: Improper input validation in parsing and distributing RTCP packet in librtp.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with system privilege. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.description: Improper input validation in parsing application information from RTCP packet in librtp.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with system privilege. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.description: Improper input validation in Samsung Health prior to version 6.27.0.113 allows local attackers to write arbitrary document files to the sandbox of Samsung Health. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.description: Improper input validation in parsing RTCP RR packet in librtp.so prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to trigger temporary denial of service. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.

item.description: Improper authentication in BLE prior to SMR Jul-2024 Release 1 allows adjacent attackers to pair with devices.

item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Samsung Keyboard prior to version One UI 5.1.1 allows physical attackers to partially bypass the factory reset protection.

item.description: Improper input validation in libsheifdecadapter.so prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2024-20821|2024-06-04T17:39:51.434Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: A vulnerability possible to reconfigure OTP allows local attackers to transit RMA(Return Merchandise Authorization) mode, which disables security features. This attack needs additional privilege to control TEE.

item.description: Improper handling of granting permission for Trusted Web Activities in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0.0.41 allows local attackers to grant permission to their own TWA WebApps without user interaction.

item.description: Improper export of android application components vulnerability in TelephonyUI prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to reboot the device without proper permission.

item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerabilities in svc1td_vld_slh of libsthmbc.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to trigger buffer overflow.

item.description: Improper access control in Samsung Voice Recorder prior to versions 21.5.16.01 in Android 12 and Android 13, 21.4.51.02 in Android 14 allows physical attackers using hardware keyboard to use VoiceRecorder on the lock screen.

item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in bootloader prior to SMR June-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to arbitrary data access.
